The trebble clef, a B flat key and 4/4 time signature are visible, along with the first few notes of the song. At the top of the image is a simple cream and purple plane. On the top musical staff line, purple and yellow flowers, a golf cart, and a man with a golf club are shown on a field.  On the lower staff line, a  family of three (a man, woman, and child) with black hair are drawn surrounded by pots, pans, and shelves, as if they are praying  in a kitchen. A little car and simply drawn trees are to the right and left of them respectively. A person riding a gray horse with a blue saddle is to the right of the family.
